verses.verse: Better<WH2896> is the poor<WH7326> that walks<WH1980> in his integrity<WH8537>, than he that is perverse<WH6141> in his lips<WH8193>, and is a fool<WH3684>.

A false<WH8267> witness<WH5707> shall not be unpunished<WH5352>, and he that speaks<WH6315> lies<WH3577> shall perish<WH6>.

The discretion<WH7922> of a man<WH120> defers<WH748> his anger<WH639>; and it is his glory<WH8597> to pass over<WH5674> a transgression<WH6588>.
The king<WH4428>'s wrath<WH2197> is as the roaring<WH5099> of a lion<WH3715>; but his favor<WH7522> is as dew<WH2919> upon the grass<WH6212>.

He that keeps<WH8104> the commandment<WH4687> keeps<WH8104> his own soul<WH5315>; but he that despises<WH959> his ways<WH1870> shall die<WH4191>.
He that has pity<WH2603> upon the poor<WH1800> lends<WH3867> unto the Lord<WH3068>; and that which he has given<WH1576> will he pay him again<WH7999>.

There are many<WH7227> devices<WH4284> in a man<WH376>'s heart<WH3820>; nevertheless the counsel<WH6098> of the Lord<WH3068>, that shall stand<WH6965>.
